reviewText: WHat a great dvd! If you love fireworks, this is the dvd for you! Full of great information and video shots. This video takes you through the history of fireworks.
Good disc. Not enough technical infoirmation aboiut the manufactureof fireworks but certainly enough demonsrtrations of displays as well as interviews of the three main fireworks families.
These dvd's are a great source of general information on just about everything. Great series to watch for all ages.
